attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that only people who have been elected to a valid UK constituency seat can hold ministerial positions in any UK government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are currently suffering under SEVEN ministers who are peers and who have not been elected to represent the voters and taxpayers of this land.  This puts the political status of this country teetering on the verge of being a banana republic where those with friends in the right place and the money have taken charge through default.  This situation cannot be allowed to obtain.  If you are not currently elected to a seat in the House of Commons you MUST NOT be able to hold down a primary ministerial position in the government of this country.
